  ### Chart B
  
  ```{r}
trips_df %>% 
  mutate(Hour=hour(start_date)) %>% 
  group_by(Hour) %>% 
  dplyr::summarize(TripsStarted = n()) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Hour, y = TripsStarted)) + 
  theme_bw() + 
  geom_bar(stat='identity')
```

### Chart C

```{r}
trips_df %>% 
  mutate(Hour=hour(end_date)) %>% 
  group_by(Hour) %>% 
  dplyr::summarize(TripsEnded = n()) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Hour, y = TripsEnded)) + 
  theme_bw() + 
  geom_bar(stat='identity')
```
